# How to Upload a Mobile App to Appdome

Last updated January 11, 2024 by Appdome

This Knowledge Base article provides instructions for uploading a mobile app to Appdome, the very first step of working with Appdome.

**To upload a mobile app to Appdome**:

1. Click **Add App** on the left.  
   ![Add app on the Personal Workspace](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/11/01-AddApp-275x366.png)  
   The dialog box that opens now allows you to either browse for an app file or drag a file.  
   ![Upload Your App dialog box](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/11/02-UploadApp-650x323.png)
2. Click the + sign and browse for a file, as seen below. Alternatively, drag a file to the dialog box.  
   ![Browse for files to upload](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/11/03-Browse-650x217.png)
3. Click the **Upload** button.  
   A progress bar appears to display the upload process.  
   ![Adding new app progress bar](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/11/04-AddingNewApp-647x366.png)
4. After the upload process completes successfully, click **Let’s start building!**.  
   ![App upload ready](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/11/YouAreReady-570x366.png)
